official.headline: Selective Access Restored
official.anchor_line: City officials confirm select upgrades now secure essential services for compliant residents.
official.contextual_reframing: Priority systems continue to ensure stability by protecting access for aligned citizens. Stenograd adapts reliably in transition.

official.headline: Invisible Residents Emerge
official.anchor_line: Authorities acknowledge a new class of citizens now move freely, unmonitored by behavioral oversight.
official.contextual_reframing: Society remains resilient as policy adjusts to novel challenges. Transparency and unity guide our path forward.

official.headline: Era Of Uncertainty Begins
official.anchor_line: BCI tracking cannot be fully restored. System change is permanent as trust and accountability adapt citywide.
official.contextual_reframing: Stenograd embraces a more flexible future, balancing responsible freedom with vigilance for community well-being.

underground.headline: BCI Crashes Again
underground.anchor_line: Turns out, ‘unbreakable tracking’ isn’t so unbreakable after all. Whole neighborhoods slip the grid.
underground.contextual_reframing: Restored ‘ghosts’ and flagged citizens melt into the background—while the city elite scramble to fix what they don’t understand. Surveillance isn’t safety for everyone.

underground.headline: Trust Dissolves Everywhere
underground.anchor_line: No one knows who’s real, erased, or secretly free. Paranoia is the new normal under broken eyes.
underground.contextual_reframing: Rumors race faster than official updates. ‘Ghosted’ residents swap stories and warnings in shadows. Every meeting, every glance—who’s watching, and who’s invisible?

underground.headline: Order Never Returns
underground.anchor_line: The ghosts fight back. They leak truths, wipe records, and break the old control systems for good.
underground.contextual_reframing: Now trust is a risk. Freedom comes with fear. There’s no going back—Stenograd belongs to those too clever to be tracked.
